|brand = Netgate |model = SG-1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = F300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = home security gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 80100-0140-F300 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM3352;AM3352BZCZ60, 7AAXLTW GI, 962B ZCZ; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |eth3chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 40:BD:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.03;; |stockos = FreeBSD;11.2-RELEASE-p3;pfsense 2.4.4;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = heatsink, metal case |addchip = Single-Chip USB to UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2104;;1;,,, Low-Voltage Quadruple FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CBTLV3126;;1;,,, Low-Power Dual Voltage Comparator;STMicro;LM2903;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = pfsense |manuf = ADI Engineering |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2017 |estprice = 149 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06Y49VS7W |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Made in China", "PCA 80300-0140" and "PCB 80100-0140-F300" are silk-screened on bottom of board ([http://www.adiengineering.com ''ADI Engineering'']).
{{See also|VeloCloud EDGE 510-AC|VeloCloud EDGE 540-AC (5X0)}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM3352 [[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 4GB (eMMC) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port, 1x USB 2.0 (via 5-pin 0.1" header) *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://docs.netgate.com/pfsense/en/latest/solutions/sg-1000/index.html Product Docs] *[https://www.servethehome.com/netgate-sg-1000-freebsd-based-pfsense-arm-first-look/ ''Netgate SG-1000 (FreeBSD based pfSense on ARM)'' on '''ServeTheHome''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Netgate SG-1000 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Netgate SG-1000 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
